name: WebRTC-Conference
body:
#WebRTC-Conference

WebRTC-Conference is a progressive web application which provides users participating in a conference the ability to listen to a session done in a foreign language, in a language familiar to the user, by tuning into a channel which broadcasts the same session in the language of your choice.



### Setup

##### Prerequisites

Install [polymer-cli](https://github.com/Polymer/polymer-cli):

    npm install -g polymer-cli

    bower install

### Start the development server

This command serves the app at `http://localhost:8080` and provides basic URL
routing for the app:

    polymer serve --open
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
